Package index

Seurat

Visualization

Barplot_Cell_Proportion()
Bar plot of the cell proportions in each identity
DotPlot_Heatmap()
Dot plot or heatmap of average gene expression in each identity
Cell_Heatmap()
Heatmap of gene expression in each cell
Grid_VlnPlot()
Square stacked violin plot of gene expression in each identity

Helper Functions

Right_DietSeurat()
Reduce the size of a Seurat object
GSEA_Signatures()
Gene signatures from GSEA-MSigDB pathways
Find_Annotation_Markers()
Get the top markers for fast annotation

tradeSeq

Visualization

curveSmoothers()
Scatterplot of log-transformed counts, and average fitted GAM smoother curves along pseudotime
heatmapSmoothers()
Heatmap of average fitted GAM smoothers along pseudotime

Helper Functions

tradeSeqPreprocess()
Remove genes with very low expression for tradeSeq analysis
tradeSeqTests()
Perform tradeSeq tests in parallel

CIBERSORTx

Reference_Matrix_Builder()
Builder of CIBERSORTx Reference Matrix
Mixture_File_Builder()
Builder of CIBERSORTx Mixture File

Data

Right_Data()
Data loader for vignettes
ncRNA_human
Human non-coding genes
ncRNA_mouse
Mouse non-coding genes
